main.name: Josh Lelito
main.description: I'm a blockchain enthusiast who enjoys researching distributed systems and building use cases around smart-contracts
main.bio: I love learning about blockchain and cryptocurrencies. In 2016 I started researching blockchain and how the technology can change the Internet. In 2019 I began to learn Solidity and build decentralised applications. My dream is to contribute to the space by building meaningful applications

resume.skillmessage: I've worked on numerous personal projects using React.js and Solidity. I also have experience using Python to automate tasks at work. Currently I am specializing in blockchain and smart-contract development

education.description: At ECU I gained a strong understanding of how technology can affect business. During my time at school, I closely followed developments in the cryptocurrency industry. During my junior and senior year, I was able to work on projects using Waterfall and Agile methodologies.

work.title: Business Analyst
work.description: When first starting at Cisco, I facilitated an automation initiative using a ChatBot to reduce IT cases. This bot has been used by 100+ unique users and has logged 500+ usage hits. I also worked on 30+ compliance controls in the finance department. Currently I am the Product Owner of the Collections Management System at Cisco.

work.title: Technical IT Intern
work.description: At SAS, I worked on an automation project to help decomission virtual environments. Using Python and PowerShell, I was able to cut down the amount of time it takes to decomission from 6+ hours to under 1 hour. While testing the scripts, I eliminated over 200 unused virtual servers which saved the IT department over $15K a month of RAM and processing power.

projects.title: Charity Pool
projects.category: Deposit money and generate interest for a charity! Vote for the charity of the week to receive the interest!

projects.title: House Tokens
projects.category: Buy and sell houses on the blockchain! Set royalties that are sent to an address whenever your house is bought/sold

projects.title: Fundraising
projects.category: Create fundraisers and contribute to campaigns! If the campaign fails to reach the goal, then you can withdraw your funds!
